content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Ice's True Skip Promotion Speech
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Finally and truly allows you to skip the promotion speech. Just instantly get the relevant licenses at the proper reputation breakpoints. No speech. No docking. No spacelegs.
content.author: Iceciro
